column5: What do you guys recommend for my fishing trip tomorrow  should I try to fish salmo @ Lake-O east tribs (i gave up spoon casting ..) or SMB around Lake Simco  BTW, i only have wader and no boat ..
would of said smallies but no boat no smallies!!!! trib it is  lol
If you want smallies on simcoe you need to be fishing 18 - 35 feet of water.  You got stilts with those waders?  If not, go for salmon.
